caption: Service Privilege Analysis
description: The Service Privilege Analysis object describes privilege analysis results for a single cloud service or resource namespace. It provides metrics on privilege usage, counts by type, and mappings to potential attack techniques.
name: service_privilege_analysis

name.description: The service or namespace identifier. Examples: s3, ec2 (AWS); Microsoft.Storage (Azure); storage (GCP).

unused_privileges_count.description: The count of unused privileges within this service.

last_used_time.description: The most recent time any privilege in this service was used.

analyzed_privileges_count.description: The total count of privileges analyzed within this service.

privilege_attack_details.description: The list of privilege-to-attack mappings for this service.

execute_count.description: The count of execute-type privileges within this service.

read_count.description: The count of read-type privileges within this service.

write_count.description: The count of write-type privileges within this service.

all_unused.description: Indicates whether all privileges within this service are unused.
